Plot waterfall charts

Source: R/highcharts.R
plot_waterfall.Rd

Plot waterfall charts

Usage

plot_waterfall(data, ...)

Arguments

data

input data

...

Arguments passed on to hc_themed

hc

a highchart object

title

chart title

subtitle

chart subtitle

label

optional annotation

base_font

default font for all chart elements

axes

show axes (default: TRUE)

exporting

include chart export menu (default: TRUE)

credits

include credits (default: FALSE)

Examples

vars = c("Rainfall", "Utilized", "Protected", "Main riverstem")
data = DATA[iso3=="mli" & sheet=="sheet1" & variable %in% vars
][, .(value=sum(value, na.rm=T)), by=.(year, variable)
][variable %in% vars[2:4], value := -value]
plot_waterfall(data)
